LanguageData.GGHWEMPGrenades.label: Haywire EMP grenades
LanguageData.GGHWEMPGrenades.description: Electromagnetic pulse grenades damaging to electronic equipment that release specialised haywire mechanites. The mechanites can confuse a mechanoids behaviour.
LanguageData.GGHWEMPGrenades.verbs.0.label: throw HW EMP grenade

LanguageData.Shell_GGHaywire.label: Haywire shell
LanguageData.Shell_GGHaywire.description: A pressurized shell filled with haywire nites. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_GGHaywire.label: Haywire shell
LanguageData.TrapIED_GGHaywire.label: IED Haywire trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_GGHaywire.description: A haywire shell connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
